page.syntax: Encrypted_String as C = ENCRYPT_STRING(C String[,C Key])
page.discussion: ENCRYPT_STRING() returns an encrypted version of a character string of arbitrary length. This function is useful when encrypting individual fields in a record. Note: Consider using the more secure A5_Encrypt_String Function.
page.example: ? encrypt_string("Alpha Software") = "$Z)kd*ky+B#1@" ? encrypt_string("Alpha Software", "password") = ">jYM?_Po?w'js5" ? decrypt_string("$Z)kd*ky+B#1@") = "Alpha Software" ? decrypt_string(">jYM?_Po?w'js5", "password") = "Alpha Software"
